article.title: Accenture to Research and Develop Command and Control Capabilities
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Accenture Federal Services Limited Liability Company, Reston, Virginia, is being awarded a $17 million contract for research and development activities on advanced decision support services, information exchange, and system interoperability, while facilitating agile command and control via internet-based technology.Â The Electronic Systems Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
